The purpose of this page is to present some updates related to the Denver green-space health-impact assessment. The source repository for this site is https://github.com/michaeldgarber/green-space-denver

**Project Updates**

* March 2022: Preliminary HIA results for four scenarios: https://michaeldgarber.github.io/green-space-denver/hia-results.html

* February 2022: A summary of NDVI of places and tracts: https://michaeldgarber.github.io/green-space-denver/ndvi-of-places-tracts.html
